<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o 0dbfs.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
; Set the 0dbfs to 1. 0dbfs = 1
; Instrument #1. instr 1 ; Linearly increase the amplitude value "kamp" from ; -90 to p4 (in dBfs) over the duration defined by p3. kamp line -90, p3, p4 print ampdbfs(p4) ; Generate a basic tone using our amplitude value. a1 oscil ampdbfs(kamp), 440, 1
; Since 0dbfs = 1 we don't need to multiply the output out a1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Table #1, a sine wave. f 1 0 16384 10 1
; Play Instrument #1 for three seconds. i 1 0 3 -6 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
